item.value: The problem here is not that for other countries there is no possibility of choosing from the drop-down list, but that the "state" field does not come to us in response into query users/initSession and we cannot display its value.

The problem here is not that for other countries there is no possibility of choosing from the drop-down list, but that the "state" field does not come to us in response and we cannot display its value. The Bidspirit user profile has this field, and it comes as a text field, for Israel it is hidden.
The Bidspirit user profile has this field, and it comes as a text field, for Israel it is hidden.
В профиле пользователя Bidspirit это поле есть, и оно идёт как текстовое поле, для Израиля оно скрыто.

The problem here is not that for other countries there is no possibility of choosing from the drop-down list, but that the "state" field does not come to us in response and we cannot display its value.
The problem here is not that for other countries there is no possibility of choosing from the drop-down list, but that the state field does not come to us in response and we cannot display its value.
Тут проблема не в том что для других стран нет возможности выбора из выпадающего списка, а то что поле state не приходит к нам в ответ и мы не можем отобразить его значение.

Hello! A client contacted us with the following problem. For Canada, there is no State field in the user profile (or as he called it: Province). We looked at the user profile in Bidspirit there is this field, or rather, it is for all countries except Israel and for United States there is a separate field with a list of states. More details in the attached pictures. The problem is that when requesting users / initSession, the address field contains the state field only for countryCode = 'US', for all other countries this field does not come to us. And even if we send it, it will not be possible for us to display it.

Здравствуйте! К нам обратился клиент со следующей проблемой. Для Канады в профиле пользователя нет поля State (или как он её назвал: Провинция). Посмотрели в профиле пользователя в Bidspirit там есть это поле, а если точнее оно есть для всех стран кроме Израиля и для United States идёт отдельное поле со списком штатов. Подробнее в приложенных картинках. Проблема заключается в том что при запросе users/initSession поле address содержит поле state только для countryCode = 'US', для всех других стран это поле к нам не приходит. И даже если мы отправим его, то отобразить у нас не будет возможным.

Messages will be sent from the room_search_offers table by a scheduled task every 1 minute where message_try_datetime > now. Try to send push -> sms -> email. After the message sent - update message, message_sent_datetime, message_type, message_sent, message_canceled, client last_message_datetime and disable_messages_until field based on Client preferences.

Fix it with the next plugin update.

1) Time zone. Fixed by plugin update. The specified time zone is -5. 2) Problem with texts and a typo in the user profile. Fixed by plugin update. 3) Problem with dropdown menu. Please shoot a video on your phone where we can see the problem. 4) White arrows on the slider. Fixed by plugin update. 5) Provinces for Canada. Fix it with the next plugin update. 6) Mandatory field for the second phone. Fixed by plugin update. 7) Address format for US. See the picture attached. It's the same on bidspirit. 8) Change colors. Black bottom bar to #c8c4be Orange to # 64625F Done, please check.
